description: IL-1α is identified as a key cytokine that controls IL-23-producing monocytes.
IL-1β is identified as a key cytokine that controls IL-23-producing monocytes.
IL-10 is identified as a critical regulator of monocyte IL-23 production.
Patients with severe ulcerating active Crohn's disease are identified as non-responsive to anti-TNF treatment.
